name: European Safe Logistics Association
goal: EUMOS is a non-profit association and focusses on cargo transport safety, including packing, storage, loading, cargo securing and other activities relevant to cargo and load safety. The goals of EUMOS include disseminating know-how related to cargo transport safety throughout Europe and to protect and support common interests of associated experts. It stimulates the development of new know-how, standards and test methods related to cargo transport safety.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Environment, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: Relations with EU institutions related to road and cargo safety inclulding lobbying. Current main initiatives followed include the Road Safety Directive, the Road Safety Initiative and Transport of Dangerous Goods. Any policy related to vehicle safety for logistics transport.
